topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546198906368723e816b0000#post_546198906368723e816b0000
The guy who ordered this thing is in preventive jail too after being on the run for several weeks but dont be fooled, he is not being juded because of the murders (apparently they were burned alive and thrown into a river in bags containing their charred remains ) but because of a number of minor charges of corruption. How is it that a simple low level mayor of a small town possess 65 houses in the capital only. Well the guy is also connected to the organized crime, has all his family in the government and his wife is also dealing with the underworld. As I said earlier, life is stupid. Aome university students have tried to protest closing down their facculties and marching through the streets,but I dont know, Im not sure itsa good idea.
